name: windows event logs client
query: agent.uuid = * endpoint.name contains 'W10-Attk'  event.type='Behavioral Indicators' | group timestamp = oldest(timestamp), count = count() by agent.uuid, endpoint.name | limit 1

name: windows server client
query: |join borg = (agent.uuid = * endpoint.name contains 'theBorg-' | group timestamp = oldest(timestamp), count = count() by endpoint.name, agent.uuid, a = 1 | columns timestamp, count, endpoint.name, agent.uuid|limit 1), win10 = (agent.uuid = * endpoint.name contains 'W10-Attk'  event.type='Behavioral Indicators' | group timestamp = oldest(timestamp), count = count() by endpoint.name, agent.uuid | columns timestamp, count, endpoint.name, agent.uuid, a = 1) |columns  agent.uuid = borg.agent.uuid, endpoint.name = borg.endpoint.name,  timestamp = win10.timestamp, count = borg.count

name: okta
query: endpoint.name contains 'W10-Attk'  event.type='Behavioral Indicators'  | group timestamp = oldest(timestamp)| limit 1
